price: 36. Argi netikintiesiems nebuvo atlyginta (Šią Dieną) už tai, ką jie darydavo?
arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hal thuwwiba al-kufāru mā kānū yafʿalūna
